subject: Standard RFP document for invitation of financial bids for PPP projects: Schedule of Bidding Process-reg.
text: HRdfy 7efty <TTHI wfear<ot ITt /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (e+ Aa &r <oarf FATGT4) 4R /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 NT #I9 National Highways Authority of India QH IExtn = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 5i-5 Qa 6, Ader-10, ERGT; 7f faorit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/218/2007-Admn: 14th January 2010 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL (44/2010) (Decision taken on MH/Goa Division'$ Note dated 06.01.2010) Sub: Standard RFP document for invitation of financial Bids for PPP Projects: Schedule of Bidding Process-reg: Standard RFP document for invitation of financial Bids for PPP Projects was issued by Ministry of Finance OM No. 24/23)/PF.II/2008 dated July 14,2009 , 2 The following Schedule of Bidding Process   shall be adhered to for all the ongoing/future projects: S. Event Description Date No_ 1 _ Last date of receiving queries 20 days from the date of RFP 2_ Pre-bid meeting-I To be specified: about 25 days from the date of RFP 3 Authority's response to queries latest by 30 days from the date of RFP 4_ Last Date of Sale of Tender Document To be specified-35 days  from the date of RFP 5 Bid due date To be specified-45  days from the date of RFP 6_ Opening of bids On bid due date (at least 45 days from the date of RFP) 7 , Letter of Award Within 30 days of bid due date 8_ Validity of bids 120 days of bid due date Signing of Concession Agreement Within 30 days of award of LOA 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI V_A (K: Venkata Ramana) General Manager (Coord)-I To: 1 . PS to Chairman 2. PS to All Members 3 PS to All CGMsICVO 4 . All GMs/DGMs/Managers 5 , AlI PIUs/CMUs/SPVs 6 Librarian/Hindi Officer NHAL
